FuncDef: This command creates an OpenFlow switch instance.

ParaDef.Info: specifies the name of the OpenFlow switch instance, a string up to 32 characters.

Specifies the ID of the switch. This is used together with the chassis MAC address to generate the Datapath ID of the OpenFlow switch instance. If it is not configured, an automatically generated Datapath ID is assigned to the switch according to the order in which the OFS instance came up relative to other OFS instances on the node. The configuration should be saved after configuring the OFS ID. If the user originally configures the OFS without an OFS ID, and subsequently adds an OFS ID without saving the new configuration, the OFS may not get the same Datapath ID (which is allocated on a first-come, first-served basis in the absence of an OFS ID). Values-1 to 8.
